text: The 1992 Icelandic Cup was the 33rd edition of the National Football Cup. It took place between 26 May 1992 and 23 August 1992, with the final played at Laugardalsvöllur in Reykjavik. The cup was important, as winners qualified for the UEFA Cup Winners' Cup (if a club won both the league and the cup, the defeated finalists would take their place in the Cup Winners' Cup). The 10 clubs from the 1. Deild entered in the last 16, with clubs from lower tiers entering in the three preliminary rounds. Teams played one-legged matches. In case of a draw, a penalty shoot-out took place (there were no replays, unlike in previous years). Valur Reykjavik won their eighth Icelandic Cup, and so qualified for Europe. == Second round == {| class="wikitable gauche" | width="180" | Team 1 | width="180" | Team 2 | width="80" | Result |- | SM Húsavík || Völsungur Húsavík || align="center" | 1-5 |- | HK Kopavogur || Stjarnan Gardabaer (D2) || align="center" | 0-7 |- | Grótta Seltjarnarnes || þrottur Reykjavik (D2) || align="center" | 6 -4 |- | ÍBK Keflavík (D2) || Armann Reykjavik || align="center" | 10 - 0 |- | UMF Grindavík (D2) || Fylkir Reykjavik (D2) || align="center" | 0 - 2 |- | KS Siglufjörður || Leiftur Olafsfjordur (D2) || align="center" | 1 - 7 |- | Tindastoll Saudarkrokur (D3) || Magni Grenivík || align="center" | 3-0 |- | Kormakur Reykjavik || Neisti H. || align="center" | 3-0 |- | UMF Selfoss || UMF Njarðvík || align="center" | 2-0 |- | BÍ Ísafjörður (D2) || Víðir Garður (D2) || align="center" | 4-0 |- | Einherji || Valur Reyðarfjörður || align="center" | 2-2 (Valur Reyðarfjörður win on penalties) |- | þrottur Norðfjörður (D3) || Höttur Egilsstaðir || align="center" | 5-1 |- |} == Third round == {| class="wikitable gauche" | width="180" | Team 1 | width="180" | Team 2 | width="80" | Result |- | Valur Reyðarfjörður || þrottur Norðfjörður (D3) || align="center" | 2 - 1 |- | ÍBK Keflavík (D2) || Grótta Seltjarnarnes || align="center" |5 - 0 |- | Völsungur Húsavík || Tindastoll Saudarkrokur (D3) || align="center" | 4 - 3 |- | Fylkir Reykjavik (D2) || Stjarnan Gardabaer (D2) || align="center" |2-1 |- | UMF Selfoss || BÍ Ísafjörður (D2) || align="center" | 2- 4 |- | Kormakur Reykjavik || Leiftur Olafsfjordur (D2) || align="center" |0 - 4 |- |} == Fourth round == * Entry of ten teams from the 1.
